rules.natural: If Platform Alpha's financial quarter was profitable, then it has met its production target for month Q3.
Provided that a cost overrun has occurred for Platform Alpha, a performance bonus is awarded to Crew Alpha.
Whenever an audit is scheduled for the financial product portfolio, the financial quarter is profitable for Platform Alpha or a cost overrun has occurred for Platform Alpha.
The activation of the evacuation protocol at Platform Alpha results in a safety breach being reported for Platform Alpha.
All personnel being accounted for at Platform Alpha leads to the evacuation protocol being activated at Platform Alpha.
Given that a compliance officer is present at Facility Control, then if an emergency drill has been conducted at Platform Alpha, all personnel have been accounted for at Platform Alpha.
The environmental impact being assessed for Drill Site 7 ensures that the rig at Platform Alpha is either operational or on standby.
The wildlife monitoring job being active for the biologist team is a condition for the environmental impact being assessed for Drill Site 7.
Provided that extraction is active at Platform Alpha for Drill Site 7, the wildlife monitoring job is active for the biologist team.
Maintenance being completed for Platform Alpha means that if extraction is active at Platform Alpha for Drill Site 7, then the rig at Platform Alpha is operational or on standby.
If Extraction License 9 is valid, then extraction being active at Platform Alpha for Drill Site 7 leads to the rig at Platform Alpha being operational or on standby.
Either Extraction License 9 is valid, or Platform Alpha has passed an inspection by the Regulator Agency.

Platform Alpha meeting its production target for month Q3 implies that if it has passed an inspection by the Regulator Agency, then extraction being active for Drill Site 7 leads to the rig being operational or on standby.

A performance bonus being awarded to Crew Alpha entails that if Platform Alpha has passed an inspection by the Regulator Agency, then extraction being active at Drill Site 7 results in the rig being operational or on standby.

If it is not the case that the negation of 'maintenance has been completed for Platform Alpha' leads to a safety breach being reported, then an investigation is launched by Facility Control regarding Platform Alpha.
It is not the case that maintenance has been completed for Platform Alpha implies that an emergency drill has been conducted at Platform Alpha.

facts.natural: An audit is scheduled for the financial product portfolio.
A compliance officer is present at Facility Control.
Extraction is active at Platform Alpha for Drill Site 7.
It is not the case that the rig at Platform Alpha is operational.
A safety breach has not been reported for Platform Alpha.
An investigation has not been launched by Facility Control regarding Platform Alpha.

target.natural: The rig at Platform Alpha is on standby.
